name: Flock Together (Aekai)
description:
A game made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1 with the theme "Stronger Together".

Description:
Flock Together is a game about leading a flock of ravens, guiding them to avoid dangers , thrive, and counterattack.

The game also features a relaxing Zen mode , where you can play around with your flock  or just watch them fly about.

Controls:
The main way to control the game is with the mouse and Left Mouse Button (LMB). The Zen mode has some additional features available by pressing keys on a keyboard. Click the "How To Play" button in the Menu to  learn more.

You can also pause/unpause the game with the Esc key, however due to the game running in the browser it might just unfocus the game.

Zen Mode:
b - add 1 bird,
n - add 10 birds,
g - remove 1 bird,
h - remove 10 birds,
t - toggle between birds chasing eggs or the cursor.

Credits:
IceMarx -  Lead programmer,
Aekai -  Design,  UI programming,
Made with Unity 2020.2.4f1,
Background art and frog sprite from OpenGameArt.org (CC0),
Music from freepd.com (CC0).
